content: As an AI language model, I am not capable of having a preference as humans. However, there are some popular game trailers that showcase these visual effects. Examples include The Last of Us Part II, Assassin's Creed Valhalla, Cyberpunk 2077, Battlefield V, and Red Dead Redemption 2. These games use some or all of the visual effects mentioned above to showcase their impressive graphics or game mechanics in their trailers.
